### Problem

<p>Killjee lives in Codaland. Codaland has <em>n</em> cities and <em>m</em> bidirectional roads connecting these cities, but not all cities are connected. Now the President of Codaland has passed an order to build <em>q</em> new roads one by one connecting two different cities.</p>
<p>Killjee wonders how many new roads are needed to connect all the cities of Codaland after construction of each road as per President's plan.</p>
<p><strong>Note</strong>:- There can be multiple number of roads between two same cities.</p>
<p><strong>INPUT FORMAT</strong></p>
<p>First line of input contain a single integer <em>n</em>, denoting number of cities.</p>
<p>Second line of input contains a single integer <em>m</em>, denoting number of current roads in Codaland.</p>
<p>Third line of input contains a single integer <em>s</em>, where <svg width="5.351ex" height="2.009ex" viewBox="0 -748.3 2304.1 865.1" role="img" focusable="false" style="vertical-align: -0.271ex;" aria-hidden="true"><defs><path stroke-width="1" id="E13-MJMATHI-73" d="M131 289Q131 321 147 354T203 415T300 442Q362 442 390 415T419 355Q419 323 402 308T364 292Q351 292 340 300T328 326Q328 342 337 354T354 372T367 378Q368 378 368 379Q368 382 361 388T336 399T297 405Q249 405 227 379T204 326Q204 301 223 291T278 274T330 259Q396 230 396 163Q396 135 385 107T352 51T289 7T195 -10Q118 -10 86 19T53 87Q53 126 74 143T118 160Q133 160 146 151T160 120Q160 94 142 76T111 58Q109 57 108 57T107 55Q108 52 115 47T146 34T201 27Q237 27 263 38T301 66T318 97T323 122Q323 150 302 164T254 181T195 196T148 231Q131 256 131 289Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E13-MJMAIN-3D" d="M56 347Q56 360 70 367H707Q722 359 722 347Q722 336 708 328L390 327H72Q56 332 56 347ZM56 153Q56 168 72 173H708Q722 163 722 153Q722 140 707 133H70Q56 140 56 153Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E13-MJMAIN-32" d="M109 429Q82 429 66 447T50 491Q50 562 103 614T235 666Q326 666 387 610T449 465Q449 422 429 383T381 315T301 241Q265 210 201 149L142 93L218 92Q375 92 385 97Q392 99 409 186V189H449V186Q448 183 436 95T421 3V0H50V19V31Q50 38 56 46T86 81Q115 113 136 137Q145 147 170 174T204 211T233 244T261 278T284 308T305 340T320 369T333 401T340 431T343 464Q343 527 309 573T212 619Q179 619 154 602T119 569T109 550Q109 549 114 549Q132 549 151 535T170 489Q170 464 154 447T109 429Z"></path></defs><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xlink:href="#E13-MJMATHI-73" x="0" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E13-MJMAIN-3D" x="747" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E13-MJMAIN-32" x="1803" y="0"></use></g></svg>.</p>
<p><em>m</em> lines follow each having two space separated integers <svg width="3.261ex" height="2.543ex" viewBox="0 -805.7 1404.2 1094.7" role="img" focusable="false" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex;" aria-hidden="true"><defs><path stroke-width="1" id="E14-MJMATHI-61" d="M33 157Q33 258 109 349T280 441Q331 441 370 392Q386 422 416 422Q429 422 439 414T449 394Q449 381 412 234T374 68Q374 43 381 35T402 26Q411 27 422 35Q443 55 463 131Q469 151 473 152Q475 153 483 153H487Q506 153 506 144Q506 138 501 117T481 63T449 13Q436 0 417 -8Q409 -10 393 -10Q359 -10 336 5T306 36L300 51Q299 52 296 50Q294 48 292 46Q233 -10 172 -10Q117 -10 75 30T33 157ZM351 328Q351 334 346 350T323 385T277 405Q242 405 210 374T160 293Q131 214 119 129Q119 126 119 118T118 106Q118 61 136 44T179 26Q217 26 254 59T298 110Q300 114 325 217T351 328Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E14-MJMAIN-2C" d="M78 35T78 60T94 103T137 121Q165 121 187 96T210 8Q210 -27 201 -60T180 -117T154 -158T130 -185T117 -194Q113 -194 104 -185T95 -172Q95 -168 106 -156T131 -126T157 -76T173 -3V9L172 8Q170 7 167 6T161 3T152 1T140 0Q113 0 96 17Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E14-MJMATHI-62" d="M73 647Q73 657 77 670T89 683Q90 683 161 688T234 694Q246 694 246 685T212 542Q204 508 195 472T180 418L176 399Q176 396 182 402Q231 442 283 442Q345 442 383 396T422 280Q422 169 343 79T173 -11Q123 -11 82 27T40 150V159Q40 180 48 217T97 414Q147 611 147 623T109 637Q104 637 101 637H96Q86 637 83 637T76 640T73 647ZM336 325V331Q336 405 275 405Q258 405 240 397T207 376T181 352T163 330L157 322L136 236Q114 150 114 114Q114 66 138 42Q154 26 178 26Q211 26 245 58Q270 81 285 114T318 219Q336 291 336 325Z"></path></defs><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xlink:href="#E14-MJMATHI-61" x="0" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E14-MJMAIN-2C" x="529" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E14-MJMATHI-62" x="974" y="0"></use></g></svg>, denoting a road between city <em>a</em> and <em>b</em>.</p>
<p>Next line contains a single integer <em>q</em>, number of new roads to be built.</p>
<p>Next line of input contains a single integer <em>s</em>, where <svg width="5.351ex" height="2.009ex" viewBox="0 -748.3 2304.1 865.1" role="img" focusable="false" style="vertical-align: -0.271ex;" aria-hidden="true"><defs><path stroke-width="1" id="E15-MJMATHI-73" d="M131 289Q131 321 147 354T203 415T300 442Q362 442 390 415T419 355Q419 323 402 308T364 292Q351 292 340 300T328 326Q328 342 337 354T354 372T367 378Q368 378 368 379Q368 382 361 388T336 399T297 405Q249 405 227 379T204 326Q204 301 223 291T278 274T330 259Q396 230 396 163Q396 135 385 107T352 51T289 7T195 -10Q118 -10 86 19T53 87Q53 126 74 143T118 160Q133 160 146 151T160 120Q160 94 142 76T111 58Q109 57 108 57T107 55Q108 52 115 47T146 34T201 27Q237 27 263 38T301 66T318 97T323 122Q323 150 302 164T254 181T195 196T148 231Q131 256 131 289Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E15-MJMAIN-3D" d="M56 347Q56 360 70 367H707Q722 359 722 347Q722 336 708 328L390 327H72Q56 332 56 347ZM56 153Q56 168 72 173H708Q722 163 722 153Q722 140 707 133H70Q56 140 56 153Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E15-MJMAIN-32" d="M109 429Q82 429 66 447T50 491Q50 562 103 614T235 666Q326 666 387 610T449 465Q449 422 429 383T381 315T301 241Q265 210 201 149L142 93L218 92Q375 92 385 97Q392 99 409 186V189H449V186Q448 183 436 95T421 3V0H50V19V31Q50 38 56 46T86 81Q115 113 136 137Q145 147 170 174T204 211T233 244T261 278T284 308T305 340T320 369T333 401T340 431T343 464Q343 527 309 573T212 619Q179 619 154 602T119 569T109 550Q109 549 114 549Q132 549 151 535T170 489Q170 464 154 447T109 429Z"></path></defs><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xlink:href="#E15-MJMATHI-73" x="0" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E15-MJMAIN-3D" x="747" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E15-MJMAIN-32" x="1803" y="0"></use></g></svg>.</p>
<p><em>q</em> lines follow each having two space separated integers <svg width="3.261ex" height="2.543ex" viewBox="0 -805.7 1404.2 1094.7" role="img" focusable="false" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex;" aria-hidden="true"><defs><path stroke-width="1" id="E16-MJMATHI-61" d="M33 157Q33 258 109 349T280 441Q331 441 370 392Q386 422 416 422Q429 422 439 414T449 394Q449 381 412 234T374 68Q374 43 381 35T402 26Q411 27 422 35Q443 55 463 131Q469 151 473 152Q475 153 483 153H487Q506 153 506 144Q506 138 501 117T481 63T449 13Q436 0 417 -8Q409 -10 393 -10Q359 -10 336 5T306 36L300 51Q299 52 296 50Q294 48 292 46Q233 -10 172 -10Q117 -10 75 30T33 157ZM351 328Q351 334 346 350T323 385T277 405Q242 405 210 374T160 293Q131 214 119 129Q119 126 119 118T118 106Q118 61 136 44T179 26Q217 26 254 59T298 110Q300 114 325 217T351 328Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E16-MJMAIN-2C" d="M78 35T78 60T94 103T137 121Q165 121 187 96T210 8Q210 -27 201 -60T180 -117T154 -158T130 -185T117 -194Q113 -194 104 -185T95 -172Q95 -168 106 -156T131 -126T157 -76T173 -3V9L172 8Q170 7 167 6T161 3T152 1T140 0Q113 0 96 17Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E16-MJMATHI-62" d="M73 647Q73 657 77 670T89 683Q90 683 161 688T234 694Q246 694 246 685T212 542Q204 508 195 472T180 418L176 399Q176 396 182 402Q231 442 283 442Q345 442 383 396T422 280Q422 169 343 79T173 -11Q123 -11 82 27T40 150V159Q40 180 48 217T97 414Q147 611 147 623T109 637Q104 637 101 637H96Q86 637 83 637T76 640T73 647ZM336 325V331Q336 405 275 405Q258 405 240 397T207 376T181 352T163 330L157 322L136 236Q114 150 114 114Q114 66 138 42Q154 26 178 26Q211 26 245 58Q270 81 285 114T318 219Q336 291 336 325Z"></path></defs><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xlink:href="#E16-MJMATHI-61" x="0" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E16-MJMAIN-2C" x="529" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E16-MJMATHI-62" x="974" y="0"></use></g></svg>, denoting a road between city <em>a</em> and <em>b</em>.</p>
<p><strong>OUTPUT FORMAT</strong></p>
<p>Output <em>q</em> space separated integers, <svg width="2.575ex" height="2.276ex" viewBox="0 -748.3 1108.8 979.9" role="img" focusable="false" style="vertical-align: -0.538ex;" cities of Codaland after creation of first <em>i</em> roads.</p>

-10 371 17T350 73Q350 92 386 193T423 345Q423 404 379 404H374Q288 404 229 303L222 291L189 157Q156 26 151 16Q138 -11 108 -11Q95 -11 87 -5T76 7T74 17Q74 30 112 180T152 343Q153 348 153 366Q153 405 129 <p>All the roads in input are valid.</p>
<table>
    <thead>
        <th>Sample Input</th>
        <th>Sample Output</th>
    </thead>
    <tbody valign="top">
        <td>5<br>0<br>2<br>3<br>2<br>2 1<br>2 1<br>4 3</td>
        <td>3 3 2</td>
    </tbody>
</table>
<p>Time Limit: 1<br>
Memory Limit: 256<br>
Source Limit:</p>

### Explanation

<p>After addition of first road between <em>1</em> and <em>2</em>, we need to connect city <svg width="3.359ex" height="2.409ex" viewBox="0 -748.3 1446.2 1037.3" role="img" focusable="false" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex;" aria-hidden="true"><defs><path stroke-width="1" id="E21-MJMAIN-33" d="M127 463Q100 463 85 480T69 524Q69 579 117 622T233 665Q268 665 277 664Q351 652 390 611T430 522Q430 470 396 421T302 350L299 348Q299 347 308 345T337 336T375 315Q457 262 457 175Q457 96 395 37T238 -22Q158 -22 100 21T42 130Q42 158 60 175T105 193Q133 193 151 175T169 130Q169 119 166 110T159 94T148 82T136 74T126 70T118 67L114 66Q165 21 238 21Q293 21 321 74Q338 107 338 175V195Q338 290 274 322Q259 328 213 329L171 330L168 332Q166 335 166 348Q166 366 174 366Q202 366 232 371Q266 376 294 413T322 525V533Q322 590 287 612Q265 626 240 626Q208 626 181 615T143 592T132 580H135Q138 579 143 578T153 573T165 566T175 555T183 540T186 520Q186 498 172 481T127 463Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E21-MJMAIN-2C" d="M78 35T78 60T94 103T137 121Q165 121 187 96T210 8Q210 -27 201 -60T180 -117T154 -158T130 -185T117 -194Q113 -194 104 -185T95 -172Q95 -168 106 -156T131 -126T157 -76T173 -3V9L172 8Q170 7 167 6T161 3T152 1T140 0Q113 0 96 17Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E21-MJMAIN-34" d="M462 0Q444 3 333 3Q217 3 199 0H190V46H221Q241 46 248 46T265 48T279 53T286 61Q287 63 287 115V165H28V211L179 442Q332 674 334 675Q336 677 355 677H373L379 671V211H471V165H379V114Q379 73 379 66T385 54Q393 47 442 46H471V0H462ZM293 211V545L74 212L183 211H293Z"></path></defs><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xlink:href="#E21-MJMAIN-33" x="0" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E21-MJMAIN-2C" x="500" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E21-MJMAIN-34" x="945" y="0"></use></g></svg> and <em>5</em> with <svg width="5.168ex" height="2.809ex" viewBox="0 -863.1 2225.2 1209.6" role="img" focusable="false" 3Q121 3 100 0H88V46H114Q136 46 152 46T177 47T193 50T201 52T207 57T213 61V578Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E22-MJMAIN-2C" d="M78 35T78 60T94 103T137 121Q165 121 187 96T210 8Q210 -27 201 -60T180 -117T154 -158T130 -185T117 -194Q113 -194 104 -185T95 -172Q95 -168 106 -156T131 -126T157 -76T173 -3V9L172 8Q170 7 167 6T161 3T152 1T140 0Q113 0 96 17Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E22-MJMAIN-32" d="M109 429Q82 429 66 447T50 491Q50 562 103 614T235 666Q326 666 387 610T449 465Q449 422 429 383T381 315T301 241Q265 210 201 149L142 93L218 92Q375 92 385 97Q392 99 409 186V189H449V186Q448 183 436 95T421 3V0H50V19V31Q50 38 56 46T86 81Q115 113 136 137Q145 147 170 174T204 211T233 244T261 278T284 308T305 340T320 369T333 401T340 431T343 464Q343 527 309 573T212 619Q179 619 154 602T119 569T109 550Q109 549 114 549Q132 549 151 535T170 489Q170 464 154 447T109 429Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E22-MJMAIN-29" d="M60 749L64 750Q69 750 74 750H86L114 726Q208 641 251 514T294 250Q294 182 284 stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xlink:href="#E22-MJMAIN-28" x="0" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E22-MJMAIN-31" x="389" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E22-MJMAIN-2C" x="890" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E22-MJMAIN-32" x="1335" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#E22-MJMAIN-29" x="1835" y="0"></use></g></svg> so, we need 3 more roads for that.<br>
After addition of second road, the answer remains the same as cities <em>1</em> and <em>2</em> were already connected.<br>
After addition of third road, we have cities <em>1</em> and <em>2</em> connected with each other, and cities <em>4</em> and <em>3</em> connected to each other. So, in order to connect all cities we need <em>2</em> more roads to connect <em>5</em> to <svg width="5.168ex" height="2.809ex" viewBox="0 -863.1 2225.2 1209.6" role="img" focusable="false" style="vertical-align: -0.805ex;" aria-hidden="true"><defs><path stroke-width="1" id="E23-MJMAIN-28" d="M94 250Q94 319 104 381T127 488T164 576T202 643T244 695T277 729T302 750H315H319Q333 750 333 id="E23-MJMAIN-31" d="M213 578L200 573Q186 568 160 563T102 556H83V602H102Q149 604 189 617T245 641T273 663Q275 666 285 666Q294 666 302 660V361L303 61Q310 54 315 52T339 48T401 46H427V0H416Q395 3 257 3Q121 3 100 0H88V46H114Q136 46 152 46T177 47T193 50T201 52T207 57T213 61V578Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E23-MJMAIN-2C" d="M78 35T78 60T94 103T137 121Q165 121 187 96T210 8Q210 -27 201 -60T180 d="M109 429Q82 429 66 447T50 491Q50 562 103 614T235 666Q326 666 387 610T449 465Q449 422 429 383T381 315T301 241Q265 210 201 149L142 93L218 92Q375 92 385 97Q392 99 409 186V189H449V186Q448 183 436
